hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Volume Surge Preceding Bull Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When NEUTRAL regime persists >15 days and 3+ approved altcoins (excluding BTC/ETH) simultaneously show >200% volume spikes versus 20-day average with positive price action (>+5%), this signals imminent BULL transition with altcoin basket outperforming BTC by >8% over next 7 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Institutional and large trader capital typically flows to alts early in regime transitions before retail participation. Synchronized volume spikes across multiple altcoins indicate coordinated positioning for regime shift, providing early signal.
entry_conditions: ≥3 approved altcoins (AVAX, SOL, DOGE, PEPE, etc.) show same-day volume >200% 20-day average
Those same altcoins close >+5% on spike day
Aggregate altcoin market cap dominance increases >0.5% that day

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Altcoin dominance retraces entire spike day gain

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volume spikes represent isolated events without follow-through or occur during continued neutral range-bound action.
